metadata.Title: CVE-2023-45311 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: fsevents before 1.2.11 depends on thehttps://fsevents-binaries.s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com URL, which might allowan adversary to execute arbitrary code if any JavaScript project (thatdepends on fsevents) distributes code that was obtained from that URL at atime when it was controlled by an adversary.

criterions.comment: npm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
